text: Ya 'Ayyuha Al-Ladhina 'Amanu Shahadatu Baynikum 'Idha Hađara 'Ahadakumu Al-Mawtu Hina Al-Wasiyati Athnani Dhawa `Adlin Minkum 'Aw 'Akharani Min Ghayrikum 'In 'Antum Đarabtum Fi Al-'Arđi Fa'asabatkum Musibatu Al-Mawti Tahbisunahuma Min Ba`di As-Salaati Fayuqsimani Billahi 'Ini Artabtum La Nashtari Bihi Thamanaan Wa Law Kana Dha Qurba Wa La Naktumu Shahadata Allahi 'Inna 'Idhaan Lamina Al-'Athimina
